Name: [Freeze] Ice Shaver
Desc: <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>. When <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> is triggered, hitting enemies increases the Agent's <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> for 5s.
Desc2: An old-school ice crusher with a hand crank. Most people see this as less of a daily necessity item and more of a toy.
